org.jetel.data.reader

Interface IInputReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DriverReader, InputReader, SlaveReader, SlaveReaderDup

    public interface IInputReader
    Interface specifying operations for reading ordered record input.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IInputReader.InputOrdering 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compare(IInputReader other)
      Compares reader with another one.
      void free() 
      java.lang.String getInfo()
      Return String with info about number of current record, and value of current and previous record
      RecordKey getKey()
      Returns key used to compare data records.
      IInputReader.InputOrdering getOrdering()
      Returns recognized ordering of input data.
      DataRecord getSample()
      Retrieves one record from current run.
      boolean hasData() 
      boolean loadNextRun()
      Loads next run (set of records with identical keys)
      DataRecord next()
      Retrieves one record from current run.
      void reset() 
      void rewindRun()
      Resets current run so that it can be read again.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrdering

        IInputReader.InputOrdering getOrdering()
        Returns recognized ordering of input data. It may change during data processing. i.e. at first it's UNDEFINED, when greater value is loaded it's ASCENDING and if some of next value is lower it may change to UNSORTED.
        Returns:

      • loadNextRun

        boolean loadNextRun()
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Loads next run (set of records with identical keys)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • free

        void free()

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • next

        DataRecord next()
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Retrieves one record from current run. Modifies internal data so that next call of this operation will return following record.
        Returns:
        null on end of run, retrieved record otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • rewindRun

        void rewindRun()
        Resets current run so that it can be read again.

      • getSample

        DataRecord getSample()
        Retrieves one record from current run. Doesn't affect results of sebsequent next() operations.
        Returns:

      • getKey

        RecordKey getKey()
        Returns key used to compare data records.
        Returns:

      • compare

        int compare(IInputReader other)
        Compares reader with another one. The comparison is based on key values of record in the current run
        Parameters:
        other -
        Returns:

      • hasData

        boolean hasData()

      • getInfo

        java.lang.String getInfo()
        Return String with info about number of current record, and value of current and previous record
        Returns:
